subject: Rowing
Olympic Games
Olympic Games (2016)
lead_paragraph: Plovdiv, Bulgaria’s second largest city, is expanding its Soviet-era rowing course, a part of an effort to overturn two decades of sporting disappointment since the glory days under communism.
snippet: Plovdiv, Bulgaria’s second largest city, is expanding its Soviet-era rowing course, a part of an effort to overturn two decades of sporting disappointment since the glory days under communism.
